org.apache.taverna.platform.run.impl

Class Run

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.platform.run.impl.Run

extends Object
    A single run of a Workflow.
    Author:
    David Withers

    • Constructor Detail

      • Run

        public Run(RunProfile runProfile)
    throws InvalidWorkflowException,
           RunProfileException
        Constructs a Run from the specified RunProfile.
        Parameters:
        runProfile - the profile to create a Run from
        Throws:
        InvalidWorkflowException - if the Workflow specified by the RunProfile is not valid
        RunProfileException - if the RunProfile does not contain the correct information to run a Workflow

      • getState

        public State getState()
        Returns the current State of the Run. A Run's state can be CREATED, RUNNING, COMPLETED, PAUSED, CANCELLED or FAILED.
        Returns:
        the current State of the Run

      • getDataBundle

        public Bundle getDataBundle()
        Returns the Bundle containing the data values of the run.

        Returns:
        the Bundle containing the data values for the Workflow
